message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but I was hoping to negotiate a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the unique value it brings.
